video.title: Canimals
video.synopsis: Born in a vending machine, these can-shaped cutie pies pop up everywhere and are filled with curiosity. But they also love to wreak adorable havoc.

episodes.synopsis: Toki annoys others with an MP3 player; A hot day calls for a swim in the sink; Canimals go diving in the aquarium; Toki falls for a can of carrots.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Pow steals Uly's apple; Mimi models for a drawing class; Fizzy imitates a TV superhero, but there's nobody to save; The Canimals have a fashion show.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mimi and Uly fight over a chocolate bar; Nia saves a goldfish from Uly; Canimals ride soda can rockets; Canimals try to outrun a growing snowball.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ato tries to save the family bird; Uly wants candy from a mazelike vending machine; Canimals steal squirrels' nuts; Uly gets trapped in a suitcase.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Nia is worried about Mimi's sleepwalking; Pow and a wasp have an airfight; Canimals save a runaway baby stroller; The Canimals run out of food.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Nia and Toki use magic to ward off the family dog; Pow tries to hatch an egg; Oz bribes Uly to fight for her; Oz and Ato try to stop Nia from crying.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Mimi, Oz and Uly fight over a sandcastle; Leon poses as Mimi; Ants invade a Canimals picnic; A fight over Nia's lollipop traps the others in a vase.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Mimi falls for a plastic doll; Nia thinks Uly is trapped in a camera; Fizzy scares Nia and Mimi with garden gnomes; Fizzy steals Mimi's muffin.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Nia takes revenge with a remote-controlled robot; Uly is trapped in a cup; Mimi dreams of being saved from a witch; Canimals take a balloon flight.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Canimals ride on a roller skate; Toki gets stuck in gelatin; Canimals eat spicy chilies; Ato befriends a stinky sock puppet.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Oz's glue-stick prank backfires; Baited mousetraps lure the Canimals; The girls mistake a cake for a big Canimal; Canimals wreak havoc at a school.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The friends fight over a warm cup of coffee; Pow showers a clock's bird with gifts; A lion Canimal is on the prowl; Mimi protects a birthday cake.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Uly is chased by a vacuum; A gorilla Canimal takes Mimi hostage; A magnetic Ato chases Leon; The girls pretend to be doctors and nurses.
episodes.title: Episode 13
